sn52.3:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anuruddho savatthiyam viharati sutanutire.
sn52.3:1.2: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anuruddhena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn52.3:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
sn52.3:1.4: “katamesam ayasma anuruddho dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto”ti?
sn52.3:2.1: “Catunnam khvaham, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.3:2.3: Idhaham, avuso, kaye kayanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn52.3:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.3:2.7: imesam khvaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn52.3:2.8: Imesanca panaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta hinam dhammam hinato abbhannasim, majjhimam dhammam majjhimato abbhannasim, panitam dhammam panitato abbhannasin”ti.
